Cool Mini Or Not (CMNAQ001) In Arcadia Quest, players lead guilds of intrepid heroes on an epic campaign to dethrone the vampire lord and reclaim the mighty Arcadia for their own. But only one guild may lead in the end, so players must battle against each other as well as against the monstrous occupying forces. Arcadia Quest is a campaign-based game for 2 to 4 players, where each player controls a guild of three unique heroes, facing off against the other players and the various monsters controlled by the game. Players need to accomplish a series of quests in order to win each scenario and choose where to go next in the campaign. Players are able to choose the path their campaign takes, navigating through six out of eleven available scenarios, so each time the campaign is played it can have a different configuration of scenarios. As the campaign progresses, the heroes are able to acquire new weapons, equipment and abilities that give them powerful options to tackle the obstacles ahead. Furthermore, by fulfilling specific quests in a scenario, players unlock exclusive features in subsequent scenarios.

I’m selling my in-hand copy of the Guildmaster Box from the Arcadia Quest Kickstarter campaign. The items are new and sealed. This sale does not include the Arcadia Quest core box (I enjoy it far too much to let it go). The package contains a total of 27 heroes and 7 monsters for a total of 34 Kickstarter exclusive miniatures and character cards. It also contains a total of 250 sculpted game tokens and some guild specific dice. This sale includes the following Kickstarter exclusive items from the Guildmaster box: - The Nameless Campaign – it includes six new monster miniatures and a new quest/story line. - 24 Sculpted Death Tokens - 20 Sculpted Wound Tokens - 30 Sculpted Coins - 16 Sculpted Guild Tokens - Special Guild Dice - Sonja (hero miniature and card) - Montoya (hero miniature and card) - Koba (hero miniature and card) - Hitch(hero miniature and card) - Victor(hero miniature and card) - Pluck(hero miniature and card) - Morgan(hero miniature and card) - Prince Aaron(hero miniature and card) - Monkey King(hero miniature and card) - Monkey Queen(hero miniature and card) - Queen of Beggars(hero miniature and card) - King of Thieves(hero miniature and card) - Black Newt(hero miniature and card) - Nameless as Hero(hero miniature and card) - Heartless as Hero(hero miniature and card) - Lord Fang as Hero(hero miniature and card) - Lydia as Hero(hero miniature and card) - Lilith as Hero(hero miniature and card) - Sting as Hero(hero miniature and card) - Bowie as Hero(hero miniature and card) - Chooloo as Hero(hero miniature and card) - Chooloo as Monster(Monster miniature and Monster card) - Four of The Faceless as Heroes – this was a surprise extra four hero miniatures and cards that were offered by CoolMiniorNot. This sale also contains three additional Kickstarter exclusive add-ons: - Bob (hero miniature and card) - Elysia (hero miniature and card) - Goldilocks Token Pack (40 Sculpted Wound Tokens, 40 Sculpted Coins, and 80 Sculpted Guild Tokens) Shipping will cost an additional $15. I plan on using USPS, and I will only ship to buyers within the continental US. However, I would be happy to wave the shipping charge if you are willing to pick up the items from me in the D.C. metro area. Payment will be processed through PayPal. Please let me know if you have any questions about these items or if you want any photos. Also, feel free to check out Arcadia Quest’s Kickstarter website (https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/coolminiornot/arcadia-quest) for a complete view of all the items listed. Please note that the four faceless hero miniatures are not shown on the website’s photos; they were added in to all the Guildmaster boxes as a last minutes surprise reward by CoolMiniorNot.

Cool Mini Or Not (CMNAQ001) In Arcadia Quest, players lead guilds of intrepid heroes on an epic campaign to dethrone the vampire lord and reclaim the mighty Arcadia for their own. But only one guild may lead in the end, so players must battle against each other as well as against the monstrous occupying forces. Arcadia Quest is a campaign-based game for 2 to 4 players, where each player controls a guild of three unique heroes, facing off against the other players and the various monsters controlled by the game. Players need to accomplish a series of quests in order to win each scenario and choose where to go next in the campaign. Players are able to choose the path their campaign takes, navigating through six out of eleven available scenarios, so each time the campaign is played it can have a different configuration of scenarios. As the campaign progresses, the heroes are able to acquire new weapons, equipment and abilities that give them powerful options to tackle the obstacles ahead. Furthermore, by fulfilling specific quests in a scenario, players unlock exclusive features in subsequent scenarios.
